TF, I disagree cos I've seen many hd conversions smaller or about 5 gigs, but my point was it cannot be HD if it is from a dvd rip. I think it's just a bit infantile to advert torrents as HD if they clearly can't be cos the source is not. There is so much confusion amongst people concerning video formats, and this kind of self indulgent advertising doesn't help.
